Text: How on earth are you ment to burn this ? it just says the file type is .001 WinRAR doesn't recognise it neither does WinZIP.

open winrar goto options then click the "integration" tab and underneath where its says "user defined archive extensions" type in "001" and press ok close winrar and look at the 001 files again winrar will extract them :)

Downloaded twice and both times the file was corrupt or damaged, I used multiple programs ro repair or extract it and nothing helped, shame because I loved this game, used to play it when it came out but lost a lot of stuff back then lol!
